column2:
"Okay, all set! My photon arts are all set in place.
How about-- Never mind, I'm sure you've got
yours all set up."

"This has been great practice. I mean, you've
got to know how to switch your photon arts
based on your opponent and where you are."

"I kinda joined ARKS in a hurry, so
I might have missed out on stuff like this."

"Thanks for practicing with me.
It was a huge help!"
